Name: A Lucky Roman Americano
Ingredients: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: THROW first 4 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. Top with rosemary soda. Special ingredient #1: Rosemary soda
History: Created in 2017 by Luana Bosello in Italy.
Nutrition: One serving of A Lucky Roman Americano contains 165 calories
